oh

one of my favorite characters he's ever

though is that John Benjamin does not
know how to play jazz piano hence the

sacks all of which is brought to the

fantastic
it's actually so good it kind of causes

of fit in the middle of the solo I think
he actually yells
um play it Joe which is kind of

putting himself in situations that are

in a position where we could play a

this album have your buddies come over
put the record on but before it's on

understand the record see where he's
coming from yeah he's really playing it
different man then you know have a laugh
and that's pretty much the vibe of every

which make up a bulk of the album
thankfully the songs are short they are
Punchy they are very basic and
straightforward the album lasts about 30
minutes so the joke doesn't get drawn

that every single song has the same

Trading Places back and forth and John
it's almost like during some of his

running his fingers up the piano keys

there's not really anything else to say
